name: Headless_demo
description:
Headless is an origin story of the Headless Horseman myth in the form of a High-Bit isometric 3D action/adventure/puzzle game. You follow the path of a revenant skeleton brought back to do the biding of a foreboding wizard, Carlyx. You are responsible for setting out through Carlyx's newly opened dimensional portals to cast a dimension anchor to keep the portals open. You will encounter perilous traps and puzzles, melancholy environments, and esoteric morsels just waiting to be discovered!

The Kickstater for Headless will be live soon! (Est mid Jan)
